name: Jason Joseph Nathan
jobTitle: Principal Consultant, Full-Stack Engineer, Technical Author, OSS Contributor
description: Published author of 'NGINX by Example', contributor to OSS including LlamaIndex, Verba, OrbitDB, and Markdown grammar projects. Known for test-driven infrastructure guides, developer ghostwriting, and performance-focused writing.

hasOccupation.name: Technical Author
hasOccupation.description: Author of deeply practical, test-driven infrastructure guides like 'NGINX by Example Volume 1', with real-world use cases mapped to reproducible CI configurations.

hasOccupation.name: Open Source Contributor
hasOccupation.description: Contributor to high-impact OSS including LlamaIndex, Verba, OrbitDB, and language tooling. Focuses on documentation, testing, schema standards, and dev UX.

hasOccupation.name: Full-Stack Engineer
hasOccupation.description: Builds developer-first experiences across frontend, backend, and orchestration layers. Proficient in Bun, Node.js, Rust, TypeScript, SQLite, and edge deployments.

hasOccupation.name: Performance Consultant
hasOccupation.description: Performs hands-on audits and tactical interventions for sites with performance, security, or infrastructure bottlenecks. Combines developer instincts with SEO awareness.

hasOccupation.name: Creative Writer
hasOccupation.description: Merges music composition, storytelling, and system design to build emotionally intelligent tech narratives. Composer and FL Studio practitioner.

hasOccupation.name: Technical Ghostwriter
hasOccupation.description: Behind-the-scenes voice for Fortune 500s and developer platforms. Crafts longform, SEO-savvy, deeply insightful thought leadership.

hasOccupation.name: Platform Architect
hasOccupation.description: Designs scalable, static-first publishing workflows with PayloadCMS, Cloudflare Pages, and custom export transformers. Multi-tenant architecture, editorial pipelines, and mesh VPN-ready.
